item.title: Advanced Elm #1: Codecs
item.description:
Introduction Advanced Elm is a project to explore some of the more advanced corners of the Elm language.
I have some objectives for Advanced Elm: showing that Elm, while simple and perfect for beginners, is powerful enough for a lot of advanced scenarios, trying to unravel how to use advanced language features like phantom types and extensible records, trying to shed some light on how I come up with complex types and simple APIs.
